entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this morning and ending near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
